file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: Trace Sandbox
  description: Trace Sandbox REST API Documentation
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:50042
    description: Local Server

paths:
  /saleorders/{saleOrderId}:
    get:
      summary: Get SaleOrder By Id
      description: Get SaleOrder By Id
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: saleOrderId
          schema:
            type: integer
            example: 1
          required: true
          description: Id of sale order
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/SaleOrder"

  /saleorders:
    get:
      summary: Returns a list of saleorders.
      description: Returns all registered saleorders
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: email
          description: Filter by exact email
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/SaleOrder"
    post:
      summary: Create SaleOrder
      description: Create SaleOrder
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
                  example: john@doe.com
                payment_method:
                  type: string
                  example: cash
                products:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      name:
                        type: string
                        example: Pepsi
                      quantity:
                        type: integer
                        example: 5
              required:
                - email
                - payment_method
                - products
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: order placed

components:
  schemas:
    SaleOrder:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        email:
          type: string
          example: michaelsuyama@northwind.com
        payment_method:
          type: string
          example: cash
        products:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Products"

    Products:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          example: Pepsi
        quantity:
          type: integer
          example: 1
